A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a generation X\, so loved the original Star Wars trilogy as I grew up. But I am not sure what has happened with the Disney versions of the new Star Wars. I don't know... but it has lost its magic. Not much about the mystical force... or great battle scenes... or the classic journey of training to become a noble Jedi. It is like just bunch of kids running around. And what did they do to Luke's character? They made him into a depressive who has lost all hope in life. Sorry\, a spoiler...(And he leaves on a whimper! No great final Jedi battle... just fades away!) Mmmm... great visuals as to be expected\, but something is missing. Disappointed.
